mapper.select: SELECT lec.no , lec.title , lec.loginID , date_format(lec.startdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as st_date , date_format(lec.enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') as ed_date FROM tb_lecture as lec

select tc.no , tc.loginID , lt.title , ui.name , ui.email , ui.area , (select dc.detail_name from tb_detail_code dc where dc.group_code = 'areaCD' and dc.detail_code = ui.area) area_name FROM tb_tcourse tc, tb_lecture lt, tb_userinfo ui where tc.no = lt.no and tc.loginID = ui.loginID and tc.no = #{no}

select date_format(cns.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as reg_date, cns.regId, tc.loginID, cns.counsel, lt.no, cns.cnsNo, us.name from tb_counsel cns, tb_tcourse tc, tb_userinfo us, tb_lecture lt where tc.loginID = cns.loginID and us.loginID = tc.loginID and us.loginID = #{loginID} group by cns.loginID;

select lt.title, ui.name, cs.regId, date_format(cs.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as reg_date, cs.counsel, cs.cnsNo, lt.no from tb_userinfo ui, tb_counsel cs, tb_lecture lt
where cs.cnsNo = #{cnsNo} and ui.loginID = cs.loginID and cs.no = lt.no
mapper.insert: insert into tb_counsel (cnsNo, no, loginID, counsel, regId, reg_date) values ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(cnsNo) + 1, 1) FROM tb_counsel tc), #{no}, #{loginID}, #{counsel}, #{regId}, #{reg_date})
